title: Clinton, Sanders Clash On Guns, Foreign Policy
text:
Clinton, Sanders Clash On Guns, Forei... Clinton, Sanders Clash On Guns, Foreign Policy There are 16 comments on the USA Today story from 11 hrs ago, titled Clinton, Sanders Clash On Guns, Foreign Policy . In it, USA Today reports that: 
Hillary Rodham Clinton and Sen. Bernie Sanders clashed on U.S. involvement in the Middle East, gun control and economic policy as they opened the first Democratic presidential debate Tuesday. Clinton, Sanders Clash On Guns, Foreign Policy Hillary Rodham Clinton and Sen. Bernie Sanders clashed on U.S. involvement in the Middle East, gun control and economic policy as they opened the first Democratic presidential debate Tuesday. Join the discussion below, or Read more at USA Today.
